author: techbro_ccoli
content:
Pre-release of `execution-spec-tests` - includes our current devnet-8 fixtures that we are running in the pyspec hive simulator
https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/releases/tag/v1.0.1

Once we consolidate on the beacon root spec change a full release will be made with additional coverage shortly afterwards
